derivation: from the same as H759 (אַרְמוֹן); the highland;
outline:
Aram or Arameans = "exalted"
  1. Aram or Syria the nation
  2. the Syrian or Aramean peopleAram = "exalted"
  3. fifth son of Shem
  4. a grandson of Nahor
  5. a descendant of Asher
strongs_def: Aram or Syria, and its inhabitants; also the name of the son of Shem, a grandson of Nahor, and of an Israelite
